original: @88a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @88a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni a'arya n'a ma tantra t'i k'a / bod skad du /
analyzed: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni a'arya n'a ma tantra t'i k'a / bod skad du /
translated: Nilambaradhara-vajrapani-arya-nama-tantra-tika🔽In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa /
translated: The Explanation of the Tantra Called Noble Vajrapani, Clad in Blue

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: bden pa gnyis la rab gnas shing //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis la rab gnas shing //
translated: Well-established in the two truths,

original: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel pa'i //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel pa'i //
translated: With method and wisdom in union,

original: mgon po sgrib pa kun spangs yon tan ma lus kun gyi bdag po de //
analyzed: mgon po sgrib pa kun spangs yon tan ma lus kun gyi bdag po de //
translated: The Protector, who has abandoned all obscurations, the lord of all good qualities,

original: shes rab thabs kyis mya ngan mtha' spangs nas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis mya ngan mtha' spangs nas //
translated: With wisdom and method, he has abandoned the extremes of sorrow,

original: snying rje chen pos sems can mun 'thibs pa //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos sems can mun 'thibs pa //
translated: With great compassion, he is the light for sentient beings in the darkness of ignorance,

original: mun ma mthong sgom rtsa ba nyon mongs zhi mdzad pa//
analyzed: mun ma mthong sgom rtsa ba nyon mongs zhi mdzad pa//
translated: He sees the darkness and pacifies the afflictions, the root of meditation,

original: gsang sngags sdud mdzad mi g-yo bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: gsang sngags sdud mdzad mi g-yo bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The Bhagavan, the compiler of secret mantra, the immovable one,

original: thugs rje bsnyel ba med la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje bsnyel ba med la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to him, whose compassion never fades.

original: gang gis gsal bar byas pa de rnams byas pa ma yin tshig don skyon dang ldan //
analyzed: gang gis gsal bar byas pa de rnams byas pa ma yin tshig don skyon dang ldan //
translated: Those that are clarified are not created, but have faults of words and meanings.

original: de nas 'dir ni gsang ba don las dga' ba skyes //
analyzed: de nas 'dir ni gsang ba don las dga' ba skyes //
translated: Then, here, joy arises from the meaning of the secret.

original: tshig gi skyon bral man ngag nyams dang ldan ;
analyzed: tshig gi skyon bral man ngag nyams dang ldan ;
translated: Free from the faults of words, possessing the experience of intimate instructions,

original: / sh'akya'i rigs kyi man ngag don ldan rgyas par bstan pa las //
analyzed: / sh'akya'i rigs kyi man ngag don ldan rgyas par bstan pa las //
translated: the extensive explanation of the meaningful intimate instructions of the Śākya family🔽is explained in order to eliminate the faults of the words of the tantra.

original: shes rab dmigs ma phyed pas bshad zin bstan pa dag / de dag sman 'gyur 'dir ni gsal bar byas //
analyzed: shes rab dmigs ma phyed pas bshad zin bstan pa dag / de dag sman 'gyur 'dir ni gsal bar byas //
translated: The explanations that do not distinguish the object of wisdom are explained here in order to clarify them.

original: des ni nyi zla dag dang mthun pa'i dam chos 'di //
analyzed: des ni nyi zla dag dang mthun pa'i dam chos 'di //
translated: This holy Dharma, which is in accord with the sun and moon,

original: thugs rje nye bar bsngos pa yis //
analyzed: thugs rje nye bar bsngos pa yis //
translated: is dedicated to compassion.

original: @88b snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: @88b snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a compassionate mind,

original: rtsa rgyud man ngag bshad par bya //
analyzed: rtsa rgyud man ngag bshad par bya //
translated: the explanatory tantra should be explained.

original: rtsa rgyud rang bzhin don rnams la //
analyzed: rtsa rgyud rang bzhin don rnams la //
translated: The meaning of the nature of the root tantra

original: sde tshan lnga lnga nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: sde tshan lnga lnga nyi shu lnga //
translated: is the twenty-five sets of five.

original: ya sha mtha' bcas rtsa ba ldan //
analyzed: ya sha mtha' bcas rtsa ba ldan //
translated: The root with the final ya and śa

original: thabs dang shes rab yi ge gnyis ldan gsum du 'dus //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yi ge gnyis ldan gsum du 'dus //
translated: is included in the three, possessing the two syllables of method and wisdom.🔽The meaning of the words that express the object of realization

original: brjod bya rtogs byed tshig gi don //
analyzed: brjod bya rtogs byed tshig gi don //
translated: is the meaning of the words.

original: rtsa ba bshad dang tshig gi don phyir ma //
analyzed: rtsa ba bshad dang tshig gi don phyir ma //
translated: Not for the sake of the root text, the commentary, or the words.

original: phyi ma mchog dang ma log bzhi ru ston //
analyzed: phyi ma mchog dang ma log bzhi ru ston //
translated: The latter is taught as four: supreme and unmistaken.

original: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
translated: The Bhagavān, the Great Vajradhara,

original: 'og min chos dbyings pha brang du //
analyzed: 'og min chos dbyings pha brang du //
translated: In the Akaniṣṭha palace of the dharmadhātu,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha became a Buddha there.

original: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
analyzed: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
translated: The emanation became a Buddha here.

original: ma lus pa yi stobs kyis su //🔽sku de rnam pa gsum gyi don ;
analyzed: ma lus pa yi stobs kyis su // sku de rnam pa gsum gyi don ;
translated: By the power of all,

original: / thob byed rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi lam //
analyzed: / thob byed rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi lam //
translated: The path of the three kāyas is the path of cause and effect.

original: dngos byed 'bras bu'i lam yin te //🔽rgyu ni tshig de dran sogs pa'i /
analyzed: dngos byed 'bras bu'i lam yin te // rgyu ni tshig de dran sogs pa'i /
translated: The path of the result is the actualizer.🔽The cause is the path of the words.

original: phyir zhing dro ba'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: phyir zhing dro ba'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of heat is mindfulness and so on.

original: nyon mongs ma tshig zhi rtse mo'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma tshig zhi rtse mo'o //
translated: The peak is the pacification of the afflictions.

original: phyir mi ldog dang 'jig rten mthar stobs lnga //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog dang 'jig rten mthar stobs lnga //
translated: The five powers are irreversibility and the end of the world.

original: dbang po lnga yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po lnga yi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the five powers.

original: byang chub yan lag bdun po ni //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag bdun po ni //
translated: The seven aids to enlightenment

original: mthong lam skad cig bcu drug go //🔽sa dang bsgom lam mthar phyin 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: mthong lam skad cig bcu drug go // sa dang bsgom lam mthar phyin 'bras bu'o //
translated: Are the sixteen moments of the path of seeing.🔽The bhūmis and the path of meditation are the ultimate result.

original: dngos byed lam ni 'bras bu sngas //
analyzed: dngos byed lam ni 'bras bu sngas //
translated: The actualizing path is the result.

original: byin gyis brlabs pas sngags mthu yon tan no //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pas sngags mthu yon tan no //
translated: The power and virtue of the mantra is due to the blessing.

original: lam ma bgrod pas 'bras bu med //
analyzed: lam ma bgrod pas 'bras bu med //
translated: Without traversing the path, there is no result.

original: dper na gru gzings bskyod pa yis //
analyzed: dper na gru gzings bskyod pa yis //
translated: For example, by sailing a ship,

original: rin chen mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rin chen mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: one obtains the supreme jewel.

original: brjod bya ston pa'i tshig gis kyang //
analyzed: brjod bya ston pa'i tshig gis kyang //
translated: Even by the words that teach the object of expression,

original: 'bras bu bden pa myur du 'byin //
analyzed: 'bras bu bden pa myur du 'byin //
translated: the result, the truth, is quickly produced.

original: des na sngags ni gsang sngags lam //
analyzed: des na sngags ni gsang sngags lam //
translated: Therefore, the mantra is the path of secret mantra,

original: lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur //
analyzed: lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur //
translated: which is made clear without traversing the path.

original: des na brjod bya'i khyad kyi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: des na brjod bya'i khyad kyi nus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the power of the distinctive object of expression.

original: 'di skad la sogs pa bshad pa mdzes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di skad la sogs pa bshad pa mdzes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to beautify this explanation and so forth,

original: rgyud 'di par brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa dang / mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyud 'di par brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa dang / mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: the subject matter of this tantra, the purpose, the connection, and the supreme purpose should be taught.

original: brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni bstan kyang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni bstan kyang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if the words of the non-existent entity are explained, those who prioritize understanding will not engage,

original: drung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
analyzed: drung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the general white color engages in front, but there is confusion about the particulars.

original: des na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams mi 'jug go //
analyzed: des na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams mi 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, because of the faults, those who follow the Dharma do not engage in it.

original: des na byis pa dang smyon pa dang mchog yin zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam pa'am /
analyzed: des na byis pa dang smyon pa dang mchog yin zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam pa'am /
translated: Therefore, fools, madmen, and those who are supreme do not engage in it, thinking it is purposeless,

original: 'di nyid kyi ma yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste /🔽tshig dang don thams cad kyi 'brel pa dang / @89a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi ma yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste / tshig dang don thams cad kyi 'brel pa dang / @89a * //
translated: or thinking it is not for them.🔽Having first determined the connection between all the words and meanings,

original: brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na /
analyzed: brjod bya dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na /
translated: the subject matter, the purpose, and the ultimate purpose, one should engage in it with offerings.

original: 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the connection and so on should also be stated here.

original: de bzhin du 'brel pa dang brjod pa bshad par cis te mi bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'brel pa dang brjod pa bshad par cis te mi bya /
translated: Similarly, why should the connection and expression not be explained?🔽Like the words of a madman, it is not connected,

original: smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel pa'am /
analyzed: smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel pa'am /
translated: It is like the ravings of a madman.🔽

original: mo gsham la sogs pa la don med par 'dod pa'i zhen pas tshig chad par 'gyur bas ma ning gi gzugs la zhen pa'i 'dod pa rnams ci nas kyang tshig chad par 'gyur zhes brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: mo gsham la sogs pa la don med par 'dod pa'i zhen pas tshig chad par 'gyur bas ma ning gi gzugs la zhen pa'i 'dod pa rnams ci nas kyang tshig chad par 'gyur zhes brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Since the neuter form is meaningless, it is to be avoided, lest the sentence be incomplete.

original: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, since it is the principal factor in the engagement,

original: thog ma nyid du dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thog ma nyid du dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: the purpose should be stated at the very beginning.

original: de gang las shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de gang las shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show from where it is known,

original: dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yang bstan to //
analyzed: dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yang bstan to //
translated: the statement of the relation to the purpose is also taught.

original: de nas dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: de nas dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: Then, the purpose of the purpose and so forth are taught.

original: brjod bya ji lta bu snyam pa la /
analyzed: brjod bya ji lta bu snyam pa la /
translated: What is the subject matter?

original: 'di ltar lam dang 'bras bu brjod bya'i 'bras bur rtog ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar lam dang 'bras bu brjod bya'i 'bras bur rtog ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, the path and the result are the subject matter, the result being conceived.

original: brjod bya ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: brjod bya ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The subject matter is nondual knowledge.

original: de yang sgras drangs nas blo la dngos su snang ba sa dngos kyi brjod bya zhes pa nas snang ba zhen pa'i brjod byas /
analyzed: de yang sgras drangs nas blo la dngos su snang ba sa dngos kyi brjod bya zhes pa nas snang ba zhen pa'i brjod byas /
translated: The object of expression of the actual appearance to the mind induced by the sound is the object of expression of appearance.

original: sgra drangs pa'i tshig gi don 'dis brjod bya rtogs pas brjod bya mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang brjod bya 'di'i don zhes 'brel par bya ste /
analyzed: sgra drangs pa'i tshig gi don 'dis brjod bya rtogs pas brjod bya mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang brjod bya 'di'i don zhes 'brel par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the words induced by the sound realizes the object of expression, and the words that indicate the object of expression are also related to the meaning of this object of expression.

original: 'di ltar lam la brten pas 'bras bu thob ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar lam la brten pas 'bras bu thob ste /
translated: Thus, the result is obtained by relying on the path.

original: de ni de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro //🔽gal te de ltar yin du zad mod /
analyzed: de ni de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro // gal te de ltar yin du zad mod /
translated: That is the abandonment of the phenomena that are incompatible with it.🔽If that is so, then why is reality taught?

original: de nyid bstan pa ci phyir snyam nas des na 'dir sgra'i tshogs lam brten par nam yang rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ci phyir snyam nas des na 'dir sgra'i tshogs lam brten par nam yang rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, the assembly of words is never realized as the path on which one relies.

original: ci'i phyir gal te byung na ni thams cad gzhung gi tshogs la sogs pa la mi ltos par 'gyur na ni don med do //🔽gal te yod na thams cad skye ba'am /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gal te byung na ni thams cad gzhung gi tshogs la sogs pa la mi ltos par 'gyur na ni don med do // gal te yod na thams cad skye ba'am /
translated: Why? If it were, then it would be meaningless to rely on the assembly of texts and so on.🔽If it existed, then all would be realized without conditions.

original: rkyen med pa rtogs pa thar par gyur pa las /
analyzed: rkyen med pa rtogs pa thar par gyur pa las /
translated: Liberation would be the arising of all.

original: rgyu med 'bras bu skye bar rigs pa med do //
analyzed: rgyu med 'bras bu skye bar rigs pa med do //
translated: It is not reasonable for an effect to arise without a cause.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: It is like a sky flower.

original: des na rgyu la rang bzhin du bye brag gyur pa med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rgyu la rang bzhin du bye brag gyur pa med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, an effect arises from a cause that is not essentially different from it.

original: phyi ma ltar na yang 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni 'ba' zhig rang las gzhan nus pa'i phyir mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phyi ma ltar na yang 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni 'ba' zhig rang las gzhan nus pa'i phyir mi 'byung ngo //
translated: In the latter case, only those that are independent would arise from themselves, because they are independent of anything else.

original: 'bras bu yan lag rgyu la ma tshang bar byung na ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu yan lag rgyu la ma tshang bar byung na ni /
translated: If an effect arose from a cause that was incomplete,

original: dus thams @89b cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste /
analyzed: dus thams @89b cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste /
translated: then the effect would arise at all times,

original: de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not depend on anything else.

original: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod bya'i rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod bya'i rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, if there were no collection of scriptures, the object of expression would not arise.

original: de bzhin du gzhung thabs yin pa dang gzhung yang brjod bya'i don rtogs pa thabs las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhung thabs yin pa dang gzhung yang brjod bya'i don rtogs pa thabs las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the scriptures are the means of understanding the object of expression, and the object of expression arises from the means of understanding it.

original: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs 'di brjod bya shugs kyis rtogs bya yin la //
analyzed: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs 'di brjod bya shugs kyis rtogs bya yin la //
translated: Therefore, this collection of scriptures is the object of expression that is to be understood indirectly.

original: dgos pa ni thabs las 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: dgos pa ni thabs las 'byung ba yin la /
translated: The purpose arises from the means of understanding it.

original: nyed kyis 'brel te de dag rang nyid kyis 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: nyed kyis 'brel te de dag rang nyid kyis 'brel pa'o //
translated: They are related to each other, they are related by themselves.

original: de'i phyir gzhung bstan pas blang dor ni dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhung bstan pas blang dor ni dgos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the purpose of the treatise is to adopt and reject through teaching.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose of that?

original: rang gi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
translated: It is the perfection of one's own aim,

original: lam gyi rim pas tshogs lam dang drod la sogs par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rim pas tshogs lam dang drod la sogs par 'byung ngo //
translated: which arises on the path of accumulation and the heat stage, etc. through the stages of the path.

original: tshu rol gyi ye shes dang mthong sgom la sogs pas 'brel zhes te de ni mthar phyin pa yang bzung ste /
analyzed: tshu rol gyi ye shes dang mthong sgom la sogs pas 'brel zhes te de ni mthar phyin pa yang bzung ste /
translated: It is related to the wisdom of this shore, to the seeing and meditation stages, etc. and that refers to the culmination as well.

original: rigs kyi bu rnams dgos pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu rnams dgos pa'o //
translated: That is the purpose for the sons of the lineage.

original: de ni me dang du ba bzhin du de dang de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ste //
analyzed: de ni me dang du ba bzhin du de dang de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ste //
translated: That is the relation of this and that arising, like fire and smoke.

original: thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o //
translated: It is the relation through the method and the method's effect.

original: des na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya rtsa nas byang ba ni rang don no //
analyzed: des na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya rtsa nas byang ba ni rang don no //
translated: Therefore, the purification of the afflictions and the knowable from the root is one's own aim.

original: 'brel pa la yang de nyid do //
analyzed: 'brel pa la yang de nyid do //
translated: The relation is also just that.

original: sa bon dang bcas pa ston pa ni rang don phun sum tshog pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon dang bcas pa ston pa ni rang don phun sum tshog pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the one with the seed is the perfection of one's own aim.

original: des na dgos pa'i dgos pa yang //
analyzed: des na dgos pa'i dgos pa yang //
translated: Therefore, the purpose of the purpose is also that.

original: gzhan la brten gzhan mu stegs dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag rgya chen pos gzhan mthar phyin pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan la brten gzhan mu stegs dang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag rgya chen pos gzhan mthar phyin pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The other is the ultimate, such as the non-Buddhist, the śrāvaka, the pratyekabuddha, the bodhisattva, and the mahāmudrā.

original: dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: That is the ultimate purpose.

original: des na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams la ni /
analyzed: des na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams la ni /
translated: Therefore, for those who follow the Dharma,

original: rgyud 'di brjod bya'i 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to //
analyzed: rgyud 'di brjod bya'i 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to //
translated: the connection of this tantra's subject matter and the ultimate purpose are taught.

original: de nas brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang 'bras bu dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bzhi nges par bstan to //
analyzed: de nas brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang 'bras bu dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bzhi nges par bstan to //
translated: Then, the four, the connection of the subject matter, the purpose, the result, and the ultimate purpose, are definitely taught.

original: gang zag dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni /
analyzed: gang zag dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni /
translated: For individuals who follow faith,

original: srid pa'i mtsho nges par bzung nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa ni bcing ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa ni bcing ba'o //
translated: The great bodhisattva is bound by generosity.

original: tshul khrims nas ye shes kyi bar du ni bcing ba'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims nas ye shes kyi bar du ni bcing ba'o //
translated: From morality up to wisdom, he is bound.

original: bde ba dang / stong pa dang / rig pa dang / bdag med pa ni bcing ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang / stong pa dang / rig pa dang / bdag med pa ni bcing ba'o //
translated: Happiness, emptiness, awareness, and selflessness are bonds.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na bdag thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //🔽de nas bral ba'i chos la yang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na bdag thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro // de nas bral ba'i chos la yang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Why is that? Because of being free from all selves.

original: rigs kyi bu mo bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: Then, the sons and daughters of good lineage should not train in the Dharma of separation.

original: des na mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i bdag lta dang / byis pa rnams kyi yod pa'i shes pa rnams ni gzhom pa sla'o ;
analyzed: des na mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i bdag lta dang / byis pa rnams kyi yod pa'i shes pa rnams ni gzhom pa sla'o ;
translated: Therefore, the views of self of the tīrthikas and so on and the consciousnesses of existence of the childish are easy to destroy.

original: / bdag med dang / rig stong la sogs pa phyogs bral gyi bdag rnams zhi gzhom par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba las mi thar ba bstan to //
analyzed: / bdag med dang / rig stong la sogs pa phyogs bral gyi bdag rnams zhi gzhom par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba las mi thar ba bstan to //
translated: Since the selves of the side of freedom from self, awareness and emptiness, and so on, are difficult to destroy, it is taught that one will not be liberated from samsara.

original: des na 'dod pa lam du byas pa'i bcing ba'o //
analyzed: des na 'dod pa lam du byas pa'i bcing ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the bonds of using desire as the path.

original: bya ba med pa thob pa med pa ni nges pa'i don zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba med pa thob pa med pa ni nges pa'i don zhes bya'o //
translated: The nonexistence of action and the nonexistence of attainment are called “definitive meaning.”

original: de skad gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de skad gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is said in that way.

original: de ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: That is the excellent time.

original: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu //
analyzed: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu //
translated: All the yakshas are completely moving.

original: shin tu dben pa shin tu yongs dag pa //
analyzed: shin tu dben pa shin tu yongs dag pa //
translated: Very secluded, very pure.

original: zhes pas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes pas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
translated: This teaches the excellent place.

original: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba ni ri rab rtse mo ste /
analyzed: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba ni ri rab rtse mo ste /
translated: All the yakshas are completely moving, which is the peak of Mount Meru.

original: de na ni gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzad po dang lngas rtsen la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de na ni gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzad po dang lngas rtsen la sogs pa ste /
translated: There are the yakshas Pūrṇabhadra, Maṇibhadra, Pañcasikha, and so forth.

original: gnod sbyin gos sngon can gyi 'khor du bstan te /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gos sngon can gyi 'khor du bstan te /
translated: They are taught as the retinue of the blue-clad yaksha.

original: de na ni gnod spyin ma rungs pa gzhan yang yod pa ste /
analyzed: de na ni gnod spyin ma rungs pa gzhan yang yod pa ste /
translated: There are also other unruly yakshas there.

original: de rnams yod pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams yod pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The existence of those is called all the yakshas are completely moving.

original: shin tu dben pa ni stug po bkod pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa ni stug po bkod pa'i gnas te /
translated: Very secluded is the place of the Densely Arrayed.

original: 'di yang dpe shel gsal ba'i nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba ni /
analyzed: 'di yang dpe shel gsal ba'i nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba ni /
translated: This is also like a clear reflection appearing in a clear crystal.

original: gzhal yas khang 'dug pa ni ma lus pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan dang ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang 'dug pa ni ma lus pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan dang ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: The celestial mansion is said to be endowed with ornaments that are spontaneously present in all respects.

original: de na ye shes chen po ston pa bzhugs te /
analyzed: de na ye shes chen po ston pa bzhugs te /
translated: The teacher of great wisdom resides there.

original: 'khor dang chos la sogs pa gcig tu bzhugs te me dang tsha ba @92a * //
analyzed: 'khor dang chos la sogs pa gcig tu bzhugs te me dang tsha ba @92a * //
translated: The retinue, the Dharma, and so on, reside as one, like fire and heat.

original: bzhin no // rang bzhin gcig par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhin no // rang bzhin gcig par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that they are of a single nature.

original: des na gnas gsum mo //
analyzed: des na gnas gsum mo //
translated: Therefore, there are three abodes.

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba /
translated: The great yakṣa general Vajrapāṇi, the one with the blue garment,

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bo'i 'bar bskur ba zhes bya bar gnas gsum du ston pa gsum tha mi dad par bstan to //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bo'i 'bar bskur ba zhes bya bar gnas gsum du ston pa gsum tha mi dad par bstan to //
translated: is called the one to whom the wrathful actions of all tathāgatas of the three times are entrusted. He is taught to be the three teachers in the three abodes, who are non-different.

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great yakṣa general Vajrapāṇi

original: gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de rnams kyi gtso bo sprul sku lag na rdo rjes 'dul bar bstan to //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de rnams kyi gtso bo sprul sku lag na rdo rjes 'dul bar bstan to //
translated: is taught to be the chief of the unruly yakṣas, who are to be tamed by the nirmāṇakāya Vajrapāṇi.

original: de la ni sprul gyi rgyan ni /
analyzed: de la ni sprul gyi rgyan ni /
translated: In that regard, the ornaments of the nirmāṇakāya🔽are as follows.

original: nyid las tha mi dad pa'i 'khor gyi gnod sbyin rnams ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis /
analyzed: nyid las tha mi dad pa'i 'khor gyi gnod sbyin rnams ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis /
translated: The yakshas in the retinue, who are not different from him,

original: nye ba'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan btab ces bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan btab ces bya bar bstan to //
translated: and the bodhisattvas in the immediate retinue, are shown to be adorned with the ornaments of emanated snakes.

original: stag gi sham thabs dang gos sngon po bla gos rnams ni /
analyzed: stag gi sham thabs dang gos sngon po bla gos rnams ni /
translated: The tiger skin, the blue robes, and the upper robe

original: gnod sbyin bred pa'i stobs kyis skyabs kyi 'od la phul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gnod sbyin bred pa'i stobs kyis skyabs kyi 'od la phul zhes bya'o //
translated: were offered to the light of refuge by the yaksha Bhairava.

original: dus gsum bde gshegs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus gsum bde gshegs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The sugatas of the three times

original: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcu la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcu la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: means that when the bodhisattva Vajrapani was abiding in the ten stages,

original: padma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhag ste /
analyzed: padma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhag ste /
translated: he was placed in the center of a thousand lotuses,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje phyung nas phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi bdag por sdud pa por dbang bskur zhing bka' gnang nas /
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje phyung nas phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi bdag por sdud pa por dbang bskur zhing bka' gnang nas /
translated: and the vajra of emptiness of the minds of all buddhas of the three times was extracted and conferred empowerment as the lord of minds of Vajrapani, the compiler, and gave him permission.

original: las thams cad bting phan chad kyis zhes pa'o //
analyzed: las thams cad bting phan chad kyis zhes pa'o //
translated: From then on, he is called the one who spreads all activities.

original: mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: He bares his fangs.

original: yid khros pa lta bu /
analyzed: yid khros pa lta bu /
translated: He appears as if his mind is angry.

original: mi me bdag gi phung po 'dra ba /
analyzed: mi me bdag gi phung po 'dra ba /
translated: His body is like a mass of fire,

original: dbugs me ltar 'bar ba /🔽'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes pa la ma che ba gtsigs pas ni log par rtog pa'i bdud rnams za zhing 'joms pa'o //🔽yid khros pas ni don snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: dbugs me ltar 'bar ba / 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes pa la ma che ba gtsigs pas ni log par rtog pa'i bdud rnams za zhing 'joms pa'o // yid khros pas ni don snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: his breath blazes like fire,🔽and he has a terrifying roar.

original: kun rdzob tu khro bo'i cha byad do //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu khro bo'i cha byad do //
translated: He is wrathful in mind, but his purpose is to have great compassion.🔽He has the appearance of a wrathful one in the relative sense.

original: mig me mdag gi phung po ni /
analyzed: mig me mdag gi phung po ni /
translated: His eyes are like a mass of burning coals,

original: las gnyis la 'jug / rang smin pa'i las dang bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: las gnyis la 'jug / rang smin pa'i las dang bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: engaging in the two actions of ripening and terrifying merely by being seen.

original: dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba ni /
analyzed: dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba ni /
translated: His breath blazes like tongues of fire,

original: smin ma dang sga tsam gyis 'dul bar bstan to //
analyzed: smin ma dang sga tsam gyis 'dul bar bstan to //
translated: indicating that he tames merely by his eyebrows and lips.

original: 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni ngag gi skyon bzhi dang bral zhing yid kyi zug rdu 'don zhing /
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni ngag gi skyon bzhi dang bral zhing yid kyi zug rdu 'don zhing /
translated: His terrifying roar is free from the four faults of speech and removes the mental darts,

original: h'um dang phat kyi sgra sgrogs pas 'khor rnams skrag pa'o //
analyzed: h'um dang phat kyi sgra sgrogs pas 'khor rnams skrag pa'o //
translated: and by proclaiming the sounds of hūṃ and phaṭ, his retinue is terrified.

original: lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
translated: His hands and feet are adorned with the nāga Vāsuki,

original: klu nag po se ral @92b khar thogs pa /
analyzed: klu nag po se ral @92b khar thogs pa /
translated: and he wears a black nāga as a belt.

original: klu nag po dang nye dga' bos snyan cha brgyan pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: klu nag po dang nye dga' bos snyan cha brgyan pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The one called “adorned with earrings of black nāgas and Upacelā”

original: lag pa la sbrul nag po dang ser pos brgyan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa la sbrul nag po dang ser pos brgyan par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be understood as having black and yellow snakes adorning his arms.

original: rkang pa la sbrul nag pos brgyan pa'i ska rags dmar po byas pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa la sbrul nag pos brgyan pa'i ska rags dmar po byas pa'o //
translated: He has a red belt adorned with black snakes on his legs.

original: se ral kha ni kla khengs po'i rigs kyis ga shar byas pa'o//
analyzed: se ral kha ni kla khengs po'i rigs kyis ga shar byas pa'o//
translated: The one with a snake-filled sling is the type of nāga called Celā.

original: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i ming yin la /
analyzed: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i ming yin la /
translated: The names are “Nanda” and “Upananda,”

original: de dang 'dra ba'i sbrul dkar pos snyan cha brgyan par bstan to //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i sbrul dkar pos snyan cha brgyan par bstan to //
translated: and it is taught that he is adorned with earrings of white snakes like them.

original: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i chod pan thogs pa /
analyzed: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i chod pan thogs pa /
translated: He wears a blazing snake jewel crest.

original: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za zhes pa la /
analyzed: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za zhes pa la /
translated: He eats blazing poisonous snakes.

original: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa ni /
analyzed: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa ni /
translated: He wears a blazing snake jewel crest

original: dbul nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: dbul nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
translated: means that his head is adorned with a jewel crest.

original: 'bar ba ni nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog bzhin /
analyzed: 'bar ba ni nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog bzhin /
translated: Blazing means the four colors of black and so on.

original: sbrul rin po che dang ldan pas dbul brgyan par bstan to //
analyzed: sbrul rin po che dang ldan pas dbul brgyan par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that he is adorned with a snake jewel.

original: gdug pa za ba ni zhal du sbrul nag po gsol bar bstan to //
analyzed: gdug pa za ba ni zhal du sbrul nag po gsol bar bstan to //
translated: Eating poisonous snakes means that he eats black snakes in his mouth.

original: des kyang gtso bo 'dod chags rnam par dag par dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'i skyon dang bral zhing /
analyzed: des kyang gtso bo 'dod chags rnam par dag par dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'i skyon dang bral zhing /
translated: Also, it is the sign of the purification of the principal passion, and of being free from the fault of impaired morality.

original: phyi rol gyi klu'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i rtags su bstan //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi klu'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i rtags su bstan //
translated: It is the sign of subduing the six types of nāgas.

original: bzhin rgyas pa /
analyzed: bzhin rgyas pa /
translated: The face is full.

original: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa /🔽ya sogs ma mchu man pa /
analyzed: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa / ya sogs ma mchu man pa /
translated: The eyebrows are gathered on the forehead.🔽The upper teeth bite the lower lip.

original: gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The form of Yama.

original: bzhin rgyas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi don rgyas pas gdong gi 'phel ba ste ;
analyzed: bzhin rgyas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi don rgyas pas gdong gi 'phel ba ste ;
translated: The face is full because the meaning of emptiness is full, and the face is expanded.

original: lha la sogs pa gdul bya 'dul bar bstan no /🔽ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni /
analyzed: lha la sogs pa gdul bya 'dul bar bstan no / ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni /
translated: It is taught that the disciples, such as the gods, are subdued.🔽The upper teeth bite the lower lip.

original: ya sos ma mchu'i steng du phyin pa ste /
analyzed: ya sos ma mchu'i steng du phyin pa ste /
translated: The upper teeth reach the upper lip.

original: bye brag tu srin po 'dul ba'i rtags so //
analyzed: bye brag tu srin po 'dul ba'i rtags so //
translated: In particular, it is the sign of subduing the rākṣasas.

original: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa ni /
analyzed: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa ni /
translated: The eyebrows are gathered on the forehead.

original: khro gnyer gsum dpral bar 'dug pa sku gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags /
analyzed: khro gnyer gsum dpral bar 'dug pa sku gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags /
translated: The three frowns on the forehead are the sign of possessing the three bodies.

original: gshin rje'i cha byang can ni khro bo mi'u thung gi gzugs 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: gshin rje'i cha byang can ni khro bo mi'u thung gi gzugs 'dra ba'o //
translated: The form of Yama is similar to the form of a wrathful dwarf.

original: des ni gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: des ni gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'o //
translated: That is the subduing of the type of Yama.

original: lce glog ltar 'gyu ba /
analyzed: lce glog ltar 'gyu ba /
translated: His tongue flickers like lightning.

original: sbrul za ba /
analyzed: sbrul za ba /
translated: He devours snakes.

original: gsus pa che ba /🔽lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsus pa che ba / lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: His belly is huge.🔽He terrifies with the sound of his clapping hands.

original: lce glog ltar 'gyu ba ni /
analyzed: lce glog ltar 'gyu ba ni /
translated: His tongue flickers like lightning.

original: sprul pa glog pas myur ba'o //
analyzed: sprul pa glog pas myur ba'o //
translated: His emanations are as swift as lightning.

original: sbrul za ba ni sbrul klu'i nad ngan 'dra bas 'dod chags kyi gdung ba sel ba'o //
analyzed: sbrul za ba ni sbrul klu'i nad ngan 'dra bas 'dod chags kyi gdung ba sel ba'o //
translated: He devours snakes. He is like a naga snake with a bad disease, and he dispels the torment of passion.

original: gsus pa che ba ni gsus khyim che ba ste /
analyzed: gsus pa che ba ni gsus khyim che ba ste /
translated: His belly is huge. His belly is large.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bstan to //🔽lag pa brdabs pa ni gtso bo lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas ma rungs pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bstan to // lag pa brdabs pa ni gtso bo lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas ma rungs pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
translated: He also teaches emptiness.

original: klu'i rgyal @93a * //
analyzed: klu'i rgyal @93a * //
translated: He terrifies with the sound of his clapping hands. He is the principal one, endowed with vajra hands, and he terrifies the wicked.

original: po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings pa /
analyzed: po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings pa /
translated: The naga king Suparna is bound with a belt.

original: aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa zhes pa la /
translated: He proclaims “ala la”.

original: 'dab bzangs ni sbrul dmar po'i ska rags su bcings pa /
analyzed: 'dab bzangs ni sbrul dmar po'i ska rags su bcings pa /
translated: Suparna is bound with a belt of red snakes.

original: aa la la ni de 'dra'i rgyan cha la ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: aa la la ni de 'dra'i rgyan cha la ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: Ala la is amazement at such ornaments.

original: de sgrogs pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: de sgrogs pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: He proclaims that is, he proclaims that sound.

original: rgya mtsho'i za bas su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i phrul mor phyin pa /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i za bas su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i phrul mor phyin pa /
translated: He has a stride of eighty-four thousand leagues across the ocean.

original: dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur zhes pa la /
analyzed: dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur zhes pa la /
translated: Indra and the sun are on his shoulders.

original: rgya mtsho la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas phyag na rdo rje'i bus mo nub pa /
analyzed: rgya mtsho la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas phyag na rdo rje'i bus mo nub pa /
translated: The ocean is eighty thousand leagues across, so Vajrapani's ankle is submerged.

original: sku byin po la nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sku byin po la nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa zhes pa ste /
translated: His body is two hundred and sixty thousand leagues tall.

original: sprul pa'i sku'i bong tshad bstan to //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku'i bong tshad bstan to //
translated: This shows the size of the nirmanakaya.

original: dbang po dang nyi ma ni thabs shes rab kyi ste /
analyzed: dbang po dang nyi ma ni thabs shes rab kyi ste /
translated: Indra and the sun are method and wisdom.

original: nang gtso bo bzhugs zhes pa la /
analyzed: nang gtso bo bzhugs zhes pa la /
translated: The inner is the abode of the principal.

original: yang na gtso bo'i phrag pa la nye zla rgyu ba ste zhes pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: yang na gtso bo'i phrag pa la nye zla rgyu ba ste zhes pa'i tshad do //
translated: Or, the moon moves on the shoulders of the principal.

original: la la na re lha'i dbang po'i phrag pa la nyi zla rgyu ste /
analyzed: la la na re lha'i dbang po'i phrag pa la nyi zla rgyu ste /
translated: Some say that the sun and moon move on the shoulders of the lord of the gods.

original: de'i steng na phyag na rdo rje bzhugs zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i steng na phyag na rdo rje bzhugs zhes pa ste /
translated: Above that, Vajrapani resides.

original: lha 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: lha 'dul ba'o //
translated: This is the taming of the gods.

original: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa ;
analyzed: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa ;
translated: All nagas are destroyed.

original: gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun du 'khrugs par byed pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun du 'khrugs par byed pa zhes pa la /
translated: With a great laugh, he agitates everything.

original: klu'i rigs kyi bdag po la sogs pa brlag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: klu'i rigs kyi bdag po la sogs pa brlag pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to destroy the lords of the nāga class and so forth,

original: ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra drangs pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sreg pa ni nad dang nyon mongs pa'o //

analyzed: yang smin cing sel bas na me la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: des ni khyod las mi da bar ston to //
analyzed: des ni khyod las mi da bar ston to //

analyzed: rang bzhin nus pa de yod pas khyod phyag 'tshal zhes bya'o // chu yi ngang la gnas dod na //
translated: Since that nature exists, homage to you.🔽If one abides in the state of water,

analyzed: chu brgyang ting 'dzin la gnas te //

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /

analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i nad dang nyon mongs pa zhi bar dod na /

analyzed: chu brgyad ni gong gi gnas brgyad du bam dkar po las chu bsgoms pas nad sel /

analyzed: de tshe 'khor gyis 'di skad bstod //

original: chu brgyad 'khor lo bdag nyid che //
analyzed: chu brgyad 'khor lo bdag nyid che //

analyzed: rtag par chu yi dkyil 'khor can ; / zhes pa la /

analyzed: 'khor rnams ni rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'o //

original: des nus pa chu dang 'dra ba'i sgo nas bstod /
analyzed: des nus pa chu dang 'dra ba'i sgo nas bstod /

analyzed: chu brgyad 'khor lo ni gnas brgyad nas khrung pa'o //

analyzed: rtag tu 'khrung par byed pa'i nus pa yod pas /

original: chu'i dkyil 'khor can no //
analyzed: chu'i dkyil 'khor can no //

original: 'byung ba'i gtso @108a * //🔽bo chu yi bdag //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gtso @108a * // bo chu yi bdag //

analyzed: mnga' bdag gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal // zhes pa ni /

original: 'byung ba'i gtso bo chu yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gtso bo chu yin te /

analyzed: de dag gi gtso bo gos sngon po yang de dang 'dra zhes so //

analyzed: mnga' bdag gi gtso bo khyod rang bzhin nam nus pa de dang ldan pas khyod phyag 'tshal lo //

original: rlung brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
analyzed: rlung brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas pas //

original: 'thor zhing 'bud pa'i bdag nyid che //
analyzed: 'thor zhing 'bud pa'i bdag nyid che //

original: zhes pas ni gnas brgyad du bsregs pa'i shul rlung brgyad kyis 'thor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas ni gnas brgyad du bsregs pa'i shul rlung brgyad kyis 'thor ba'o //

analyzed: gzhan de'i nus pa'i dug 'thor ba ste gong ma'o //

analyzed: 'thor zhing 'bud pas na rlung dang 'dra ba'i nus pas 'thor zhes pa'o //

original: che ba ste spobs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: che ba ste spobs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is great, that is, it is endowed with eloquence.

original: rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs can //
analyzed: rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs can //
translated: The great wind is powerful and forceful,

original: rlung lha gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rlung lha gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, Vāyu, the blue-clad one.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: In this,

original: chen po ni ye shes kyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: chen po ni ye shes kyi rlung ngo //

original: drag po rtsal shugs ni thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: drag po rtsal shugs ni thogs pa med pa'o //

original: rlung lha gos sngon can ni //
analyzed: rlung lha gos sngon can ni //
translated: Vāyu, the blue-clad one,

original: dngos te de la de'i nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos te de la de'i nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the actual wind because its power exists there.

analyzed: sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas // mi ga+yo brtan pa'i las mdzad pa //
translated: Abiding in the maṇḍala of the earth,

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: you perform the function of stability without moving.

analyzed: sa ni gzhan gyi nus pa gnon pa ste gzhan gyi nus pa gnon pa'i tshes dang 'dra ba la gnas zhes bya'o //

original: mi ga+yo ba ni bdag nyid la tshur mi brdzi ba'o //
analyzed: mi ga+yo ba ni bdag nyid la tshur mi brdzi ba'o //

original: brtan pa ni mis mi ldan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mis mi ldan zhes pa'o //

analyzed: gser ldan rol mo sna tshogs bdag / sa bdag 'khor bdag khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You who are golden, the lord of various music, the lord of the earth, the lord of the retinue, I pay homage to you.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: In this,

analyzed: gnon pa'i tshe gser gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
translated: at the time of suppression, it is like a golden wheel,

original: rol mo ni des snang ba'o //
analyzed: rol mo ni des snang ba'o //

original: sna tshogs ni 'byung ba bzhis 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs ni 'byung ba bzhis 'dul ba'o //

analyzed: sa brgyad kyi 'khor lo gnas brgyad du'o //

original: khyod ni de'i rang bzhin yin pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khyod ni de'i rang bzhin yin pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Since you are the nature of that, I pay homage.

analyzed: le'u bcu gsum pa ni grangs kyi bcu gsum pa'o //

analyzed: lag na rdo rje rtsa pa'i rgyud las le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //

original: de ltar bskyed pa dang grogs spyod bstan kyang /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa dang grogs spyod bstan kyang /

analyzed: rdzogs rim ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de bstan to //

original: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
analyzed: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //

original: phra mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: phra mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa // zhes pa la /

original: de nas de'u bcu gsum pa song ba'i rting de nas /
analyzed: de nas de'u bcu gsum pa song ba'i rting de nas /

analyzed: yon tan gnyis dang ldan pa'i gos sngon can des /

analyzed: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpe'i ye @108b shes dang / las dang lam gyi ye shes ma yin te /

analyzed: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas zhes bshad do //

original: lam yang mtshan bcas dang mtshan med do //
analyzed: lam yang mtshan bcas dang mtshan med do //

original: phra mo stong nyid goms pa'o //
analyzed: phra mo stong nyid goms pa'o //

original: snang ba dngos su med pa ste //
analyzed: snang ba dngos su med pa ste //

original: snang ba stong ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snang ba stong ba'i rang bzhin no //

original: stong la bde ba'i rig pa'o ;
analyzed: stong la bde ba'i rig pa'o ;

original: / de ni snang ba dngos su bstan //
analyzed: / de ni snang ba dngos su bstan //

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel //

analyzed: mi rtog spros bral goms pa ni //

original: mtshan med lam du bstan pa yin //
analyzed: mtshan med lam du bstan pa yin //

original: skye ba rmi lam bar do nas //
analyzed: skye ba rmi lam bar do nas //

analyzed: srid pa bar do gsum du'o //

original: de yang mi rtog spros bral lo //
analyzed: de yang mi rtog spros bral lo //

original: de ni gsang ba'i srid pa'i lung las //
analyzed: de ni gsang ba'i srid pa'i lung las //

original: srid gsum rang bzhin 'pho ba yang //
analyzed: srid gsum rang bzhin 'pho ba yang //

original: 'bras bu yang dag 'byin pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang dag 'byin pa ste /

original: 'di ni rnam shes 'pho 'jug go //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam shes 'pho 'jug go //

original: mtshan bcas kun brtags rtsa rlung gi /'khor gyi gnod spyin mang po kun //
analyzed: mtshan bcas kun brtags rtsa rlung gi /'khor gyi gnod spyin mang po kun //

analyzed: shin tu yid dga' dang bas zhus // zhes pa la /
translated: are delighted and ask with faith.

analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dga' nas /

analyzed: 'khor gyi nang nas rnam par rgyal bzhes bya'o //
translated: they are called “victorious in the retinue.”

original: phra mo thig le chen po yis //
analyzed: phra mo thig le chen po yis //

analyzed: cir snang dngos po gcig tu 'dus //

analyzed: de nyid mtha' 'das rang bzhin med // ces pa la /

original: phra mo thig le chen po ni //
analyzed: phra mo thig le chen po ni //

analyzed: spyi bo dang ni mgrin pa dang // snying ga dang ni lte ba dang // gtum mo rlung gi 'khor lo rnams so //

analyzed: rang 'byung gi yi ge gnas pa ni thig le'o //

analyzed: thig le las me 'bar te bde ba /

analyzed: de nyid mtha' 'das ni lam chos kyi phyag rgya 'od gsal nyams su blangs pas de ni lam gyi 'od gsal zhes bya'o //
translated: That itself is beyond extremes. The path is the practice of the clear light of the dharma mudra. That is called the “clear light of the path.”

original: rang bzhin med ni 'bras bu chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med ni 'bras bu chos kyi sku thob pa'o //

analyzed: dngos po mtha' dang / bral bas rang bzhin med ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is free from the extremes of entities, it is called “the absence of nature.”

original: yum lcang lo can la /
analyzed: yum lcang lo can la /
translated: In the mother, the Aṭalā,

original: sbrul pa bde chen longs spyod chos //
analyzed: sbrul pa bde chen longs spyod chos //

original: rlung dang me la rab gnas pas //🔽mtha' 'das rang bzhin chos sku thob //
analyzed: rlung dang me la rab gnas pas // mtha' 'das rang bzhin chos sku thob //

One attains the dharmakāya, the nature beyond extremes.

analyzed: gsungs so ; / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //

original: bla med rdzogs pa'i klong chen du //
analyzed: bla med rdzogs pa'i klong chen du //
translated: In the supreme, perfect great expanse,

original: 'dod chags ting 'dzin la gnas pa //
analyzed: 'dod chags ting 'dzin la gnas pa //
translated: Abiding in the samādhi of desire,

original: zhes pa las /
analyzed: zhes pa las /
translated: As stated.

original: sems can chags pa can drangs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can chags pa can drangs pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to guide passionate sentient beings,

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa bstan te /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa bstan te /

analyzed: rin po che'i mtshan gos sngon can ni rdo rje zhi ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //

analyzed: padma gos sngon can ni khro mo dag byed ma dang snyoms par zhugs so //

analyzed: las kyi gos sngon can ni rdo rje rgyal ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //

analyzed: de dga' ba bzhi rnam par dag pa skye ba'i tshul bstan te /

analyzed: de ni 'dod pa la zhen pa rnams rab tu 'joms pa'o //

analyzed: lung las rdo rje khro bo rnams dang sbyor //

analyzed: gzhan la bde ba 'phro 'du bya // 'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa //
translated: He causes the bliss of others to come and go.🔽He is endowed with the method of the four joys,

original: dga' bzhi'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dga' bzhi'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
translated: such as kissing, embracing, and so on.

original: des kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: des kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur //

original: zhes pa'o // 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun //🔽gnas dang dus dang rgyal ba las //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun // gnas dang dus dang rgyal ba las //
translated: All the many yakṣa retinues

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /

analyzed: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po chags pa dang bral ba'i rigs so //

analyzed: bslang ste bla med don bstan pas //
translated: Having raised them, he taught the meaning of the unsurpassed,

analyzed: thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: and all the yakshas manifestly awakened through passion.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: In this regard,

original: bam sam sa ma ya ho //
analyzed: bam sam sa ma ya ho //
translated: he uttered bam sam sa ma ya ho,

original: zhes brjod nas brgyal ba kun bslangs /
analyzed: zhes brjod nas brgyal ba kun bslangs /
